name: hawaii

a group of islands in the Pacific Ocean that is a state of the US : She returned to Hawaii in the summer. Hawaii is the only state that is an archipelago.
(also Hawaiʻi) (also Hawaii Island, Hawaiʻi Island) the largest island in the group of Pacific islands that forms the US state of Hawaii: We flew to Hawaiʻi then took a boat to Molokai. She lives in Captain Cook on the west side of Hawaiʻi Island.
More examplesFewer examplesWe knew no-one in Hawaii.He retired to Hawaii ten years ago.The name of the state, Hawaii, is not written with an 'okina because our Statehood Act in 1959 used the spelling "Hawaii" and it would require an Act of Congress to change this. Hawaiʻi is the southeasternmost of the Hawaiian Islands.The Hawaii Volcanoes National Park is on SE Hawaii island.
